citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:13 AM on July 3,
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector
attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file, leaving a voicemail message. The licensee returned the
inspector’s call, stating no one was available for an inspection today.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:13 AM on July 3, 
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector 
attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file, leaving a voicemail message. The licensee returned the 
inspector’s call, stating no one was available for an inspection today. 
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
